job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Machine Learning Engineer (Qualcomm AI Research, Amsterdam)
job_details.full_text: Senior Machine Learning Engineer (Qualcomm AI Research, Amsterdam)

profile_classification.rationale: The job title 'Senior Machine Learning Engineer' and the focus on 'Qualcomm AI Research' strongly suggest a role centered around core machine learning principles and research. While Generative AI is a part of modern ML, the description doesn't explicitly emphasize LLMs, RAG, or agent development as the primary focus, which are hallmarks of a GenAI Engineer. The emphasis is more on the foundational aspects of ML research and engineering.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Machine Learning Engineer' implies the core task of building and refining machine learning models. 'AI Research' further suggests a focus on developing and advancing modeling techniques.
The term 'AI Research' directly points to activities involving the development and exploration of artificial intelligence models and techniques.
The role of an engineer, especially a senior one in research, often involves translating research into practical implementations and potentially building systems around models.
